object.name: SwitchInlineQueryChosenChat
object.description: This object represents an inline button that switches the current user to inline mode in a chosen chat, with an optional default inline query.
object.html_description: This object represents an inline button that switches the current user to inline mode in a chosen chat, with an optional default inline query.
object.rst_description: This object represents an inline button that switches the current user to inline mode in a chosen chat, with an optional default inline query.

annotations.description: The default inline query to be inserted in the input field. If left empty, only the bot's username will be inserted
annotations.html_description: Optional. The default inline query to be inserted in the input field. If left empty, only the bot's username will be inserted
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The default inline query to be inserted in the input field. If left empty, only the bot's username will be inserted
annotations.name: query

annotations.description: True, if private chats with users can be chosen
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if private chats with users can be chosen
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if private chats with users can be chosen
annotations.name: allow_user_chats

annotations.description: True, if private chats with bots can be chosen
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if private chats with bots can be chosen
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if private chats with bots can be chosen
annotations.name: allow_bot_chats

annotations.description: True, if group and supergroup chats can be chosen
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if group and supergroup chats can be chosen
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if group and supergroup chats can be chosen
annotations.name: allow_group_chats

annotations.description: True, if channel chats can be chosen
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if channel chats can be chosen
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if channel chats can be chosen
annotations.name: allow_channel_chats
